## Workflow / Steps
- ## Technical Context
- GitHub Agentic Workflows (gh-aw) is a Go-based GitHub CLI extension for writing AI-powered workflows in natural language using markdown files that compile to GitHub Actions YAML.
- ## Project Glossary
- The following 1000 technical terms are specific to gh-aw and should be corrected when encountered in speech-to-text input:
- about
- abuse
